alert.note: Alert for Goochland; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chesterfield, southeastern Goochland and northwestern Henrico Counties and the City of Richmond through 1030 PM EDT... At 957 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bon Air, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... University Of Richmond around 1010 PM EDT. Richmond and Tuckahoe around 1020 PM EDT. Laurel and Lakeside around 1030 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Dumbarton, Midlothian, Short Pump, Greendale and Roslyn Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Goochland; Western Chesterfield; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
